comment.author: 61614891@N06
comment._content: Someone at SDA&SM obviously made a mistake, as this is a Twin Otter, and I'm reasonably certain my slide was marked as such.   Signed, I. E. Quastler, the photographer

comment.author: 39827348@N05
comment._content: The Twin Otter is indeed a model number DHC-6. I cant see the entire registration number but the CA at the end of it most likely denotes that this Allegheny Commuter plane was owned by Clark Aviation aka Pennsylvania Commuter Airlines.
